original_text: They made the plate of the holy crown of pure gold, and wrote on it an inscription, like the engraving of a signet, “Holy to the Lord.”
korean_text: 그들이 또 순금으로 거룩한 패를 만들고 도장을 새김 같이 그 위에 '여호와께 성결'이라 새기고

sentences.original_text: They made the plate of the holy crown of pure gold
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 순금으로 거룩한 관의 패를 만들었습니다.

sentences.original_text: and wrote on it an inscription
like the engraving of a signet
